perturbation.original_text: Exhibit 10.4 FORM OF TRANSFER AND SERVICING AGREEMENT among VERIZON OWNER TRUST 2020-A, as Issuer, VERIZON ABS LLC, as Depositor and CELLCO PARTNERSHIP d/b/a VERIZON WIRELESS, as Servicer, Marketing Agent and Custodian Dated as of January 29, 2020 Source: VERIZON ABS LLC, 8-K, 1/23/2020
perturbation.changed_text: Exhibit 10.4 FORM OF TRANSFER AND SERVICING AGREEMENT among VERIZON OWNER TRUST 2020-A, as Issuer, VERIZON ABS LLC, as Depositor and CELLCO PARTNERSHIP d/b/a VERIZON WIRELESS, as Service Provider, Sales Agent and Warehouse Manager Dated as of January 29, 2020 Source: VERIZON ABS LLC, 8-K, 1/23/2020
perturbation.explanation: The original text refers to CELLCO PARTNERSHIP d/b/a VERIZON WIRELESS as Servicer, Marketing Agent and Custodian, while the modified text refers to it as Service Provider, Sales Agent and Warehouse Manager. Using these terms interchangeably without clearly defining that they all mean the same entity can cause confusion.

perturbation.original_text:
Section 3.2 Servicing of Receivables.
(a) General Servicing Obligations. The Servicer will manage, service, administer and collect on the Receivables with reasonable care using that degree of skill and attention that the Servicer exercises for all comparable device payment plan agreement receivables that it services for itself or others according to the Servicing Procedures.
perturbation.changed_text:
Section 3.2 Handling of Receivables.
(a) General Handling Obligations. The Servicer will manage, service, administer and collect on the Receivables with reasonable care using that degree of skill and attention that the Service Provider exercises for all comparable device payment plan agreement receivables that it services for itself or others according to the Servicing Procedures.
perturbation.explanation: The original text refers to 'Servicer' while the modified version uses both 'Servicer' and 'Service Provider'. It creates uncertainty because the term was changed but might refer to the same entity.

perturbation.original_text:
Section 3.11 Marketing Agent.
(a) Appointment of Marketing Agent. The Issuer and the Servicer appoint Cellco to act as Marketing Agent for the Receivables. Cellco accepts the appointment and agrees to perform its obligations set forth in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Section 3.11 Sales Agent.
(a) Appointment of Sales Agent. The Issuer and the Servicer appoint Cellco to act as Sales Agent for the Receivables. Cellco accepts the appointment and agrees to perform its obligations set forth in this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original text refers to 'Marketing Agent' while the modified version uses 'Sales Agent'. It creates uncertainty because the term was changed but might refer to the same entity.
